item.title: API | Weather Underground
item.description:
API | Weather Underground

Weather Underground provides local & long range Weather Forecast, weather reports, maps & tropical weather conditions for locations worldwide.

item.title: Stripe: The best way to accept payments online or in your apps
item.description:
Stripe: The best way to accept payments online or in your apps

Robust, clean APIs that let you focus on building great products. There are Stripe libraries in everything from Java to Go. Check out the docs and explore the full API reference curl Ruby Python PHP Java Node Go These actually work-try running them directly in your terminal.

item.title: Email Delivery & Transactional Email Service | SendGrid
item.description:
Email Delivery & Transactional Email Service | SendGrid

Learn why more developers choose SendGrid for their email deliverability service to send transactional emails triggered by web apps. Get started for free

item.title: Pusher | Leader In Realtime Technologies
item.description:
Pusher | Leader In Realtime Technologies

Each month, we deliver over 40 billion messages to more than 3.5 billion devices through our API.

item.title: Hosted cloud search as a service | AlgoliaSearch
item.description:
Hosted cloud search as a service | AlgoliaSearch

Algolia's Search API makes it easy to deliver a great search experience in your apps & websites. Algolia Search provides hosted full-text, numerical, faceted and geolocalized search.

item.title: Apiary - Build beautiful APIs
item.description:
Apiary - Build beautiful APIs

Apiary makes API development simple and collaborative. The Apiary platform is the only developer-centric solution with tooling for every stage of the API lifecycle: designing, prototyping, testing, and documentation.

item.title: The Dark Sky Forecast API
item.description:
The Dark Sky Forecast API

The same API that powers Forecast.io and Dark Sky for iOS can provide accurate short­term and long­term weather predictions to your business, application, or crazy idea.

item.title: Twilio - APIs for Text Messaging, VoIP & Voice in the Cloud
item.description:
Twilio - APIs for Text Messaging, VoIP & Voice in the Cloud

Cloud communications platform for building Voice & Messaging applications on an API built for global scale. Get started with a free trial.
